attributes.action: Politicians tranfer part/all of salaries to health care during Covid-19 crisis
attributes.additional_details: Civil service pay inequality and the major need for funds in health and social care.
attributes.background: Give as much as possible to NHS and social care from the salaries of politicians. During the crisis period and possibly into the future.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on charitable donations are for individual MPs, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.

The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
